description.en:
Roe, the main character, has difficulty understanding the feelings of others. One day, she witnesses a murder scene and is branded as the culprit. Framed and called the “Diabolical Witch—Murder,” she dies by her father’s hands. However… She who definitely died before her father’s resentful gaze somehow reincarnates into her 15-year-old self, five years before her death. As a blunt person who cannot sympathize with or understand other people’s feelings, Roe only thought it to be annoying to have to repeat the same life again, and… Contrary to her expectations that it would simply be a repetition of the past, her life gets entangled with life’s events and she starts heading in a new direction…! 

A Romance Fantasy full of her development, as transparent watercolors slowly spread into her once grey and monotonous life!

---
Roelle Chloe has never been able to feel emotions. Even during her past life, living as an outcast in the back alleys of the capital, the empire's most hated mage didn't shed a single tear. And dying at the hands of her father didn't improve her inability to feel empathy. But after being given a second chance at life after death, Roelle realizes that she might be able to use her magical gifts to change her bitter fate. From friendship to romance, and even family... Can Roelle use her blood magic for good while learning to love and be loved?
description.es: Roe, la protagonista, tiene dificultades para comprender los sentimientos de los demás. Un día, presencia la escena de un asesinato y es señalada como la culpable. Inculpada y calificada de “bruja diabólica asesina”, muere a manos de su padre. Sin embargo… La que definitivamente murió ante la mirada resentida de su padre, de alguna manera se reencarna en su yo de 15 años, cinco años antes de su muerte. Como persona brusca que no puede simpatizar ni comprender los sentimientos de los demás, Roe sólo pensó que sería molesto tener que repetir de nuevo la misma vida, y… Contrariamente a sus expectativas de que sería simplemente una repetición del pasado, ¡su vida se enreda con los acontecimientos de la vida y empieza a tomar una nueva dirección…! ¡Una Fantasía Romántica llena de su desarrollo, mientras acuarelas transparentes se extienden lentamente en su vida una vez gris y monótona!
description.ko: 타인의 감정을 이해할 수 없는 무미건조함 속에 살아온 주인공, 로에는 어느 날 갑자기 살인 현장을 목격함과 동시에 범인으로 낙인 찍혀 '최악의 마법사 - 살인사' 라는 누명을 쓴 채 자신의 아버지에 손에 죽음을 맞이하게 된다. 그런데.....분명 원망 어린 아버지의 눈빛 속에 죽었던 그녀는 어찌된 영문인지 죽음을 맞이하기 5년 전인 열 다섯 살, 그녀의 어린 시절로 회귀하게 된다. 타인의 감정에 공감할 수도, 이해할 수도 없는 무뚝뚝한 로에로서는 다시 똑같은 삶을 반복해야 한다는 것이 귀찮기만 하고.......그저 똑같은 과거의 반복일 것이라 생각한 그녀의 예상과는 달리,그녀의 삶은 사건과 얽히며 새로운 방향으로 나아가기 시작하는데....! 건조한 회색빛이었던
